name: Enterpulse
overview: Enterpulse, Inc. provides software solutions for the wireless companies, regional and worldwide banks, credit card companies, brokerages, pharmaceutical and consumer goods companies, media and communications companies, and government entities in the United States. Its products include Healthcare Member Portal, a platform for health care networks concerned about maintaining privacy, security, and confidentiality; Portal in a Box that addresses communication and collaboration solutions; and Composite Application Provisioning, which enables customers to manage the application provisioning process for composite applications, such as portals. The company also provides business process management, content management, portal, and methodology services. Enterpulse, Inc. was formerly known as Third Millennium Communications, Inc. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Decatur, Georgia with an additional office in New Jersey. As of September 29, 2008, Enterpulse, Inc. operates as a subsidiary of Idhasoft Inc.
